Authors: Zongting Yao, Shu-Hua Jiang, Zefeng Jia
Title:
Mazosia weii sp. nov. (Roccellaceae) from China, a new
species supported by molecular data
Keywords: Genotype; Mazosia; New species; Phenotype; Taxonomy
Abstract:
During a study of the genus Mazosia in China, a new
species, named here Mazosia weii was found. It is characterized by a
pilose thallus with brown verrucae and 3-septate ascospores measuring
22.535 × 46.25 µm. The morphological, anatomical, and chemical
characteristics are described in detail and a key to Mazosia with pilose
thalli is added.
